topics.body:
I wanna make a comic in the vein of a shonen series but halfway through one of the arcs all the heroes die and the villain accomplishes his goals

Like imagine if Frieza had gotten the dragon balls and became an invincible God 
After a while he would control the whole universe and then get bored of ther never being anything to challenge him. It would be like evil space one punch man
